Safe & Sharp Clipping Blade — Sharp stainless steel and ceramic blade,with round head design,you can do the grooming at home easily and safely.
Washable & USB Rechargeable — Large capacity lithium-ion battery,can be charged via USB cable anytime,you can trim you pet in the garden or any other outdoor occasions.The blade is detachable and washable directly under the water tab,you can clean the hair with the brush easily.
Long Time Power Supply — The pet clipper built-in powerful & rechargeable lithium-ion battery,it can work 90 minutes of cordless operating after 3 hours fully charged,it can keep home pet grooming running continuously,no more worries about power off when working.
Warm Tips for Pet Trimming — If your pets have thick and long coats, please do use the scissor to cut shorter firstly. Or else the clipper may get jammed up while trimming.

We have always put the customer experience at the center and our vision is to continuously improve our products according to customer needs. CW002 Pet Water Fountain ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $42.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:05 UTC – Details)

From the brand

At PUPIHOM we are focusing on high-quality pet products and are committed to providing your pets with a healthier life. We have always put the customer experience at the center and our vision is to continuously improve our products according to customer needs.

CW002 Pet Water Fountain

CW003 Pet Water Fountain

CW004 Pet Water Fountain

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.67 x 8.58 x 5.59 inches; 2.71 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ Submarine
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 6, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ H&H
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09ZPBW85D
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Switzerland

【Wide Drinking Area】The drinking dispenser with the 300ml extra-large water dish is ideal for families with multiple pets. Even in the event of a sudden power outage, there is enough water to last a day.
【Noise-Free】The pet water fountain is equipped with unique water way design which reduces the sound of the water flow to less than 36 decibels, and enjoys a quiet moment with your cute pet.
【Premium Materials】The dispenser is made from high quality ABS material which is BPA free, for a more durable experience.
【Powerful Filtration】The 3-stage filtration system of the water fountain effectively removes sediment, dust, hair, odor, chlorine, heavy metals for a clean drinking experience.
【3 Flow Modes】The fountain has 3 modes namely spring, flower bubble and flower waterfall, which can be switched as per the pet’s needs, which will help keep your pet interested to help them drink more water.
【After Sales】With our reliable quality control, customer service and technical support, we provide you with a 6 month return policy. If you have any confusion regard to the product, please feel free to contact us.
Note: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

PUPIHOM CW003 Pet Water Fountain

* 7*24 circulating filtration, so that every drop of water can be fully purified, drinking clean, soft water for a long time is beneficial to the health of the pet’s urinary system.

* The pet water feeder solves your trouble of frequently feeding pets. The 3.4L effective capacity can supply a small and medium pet for a week, which is suitable for families who often take short trips.

* Design Patent: The water flowing from the drinking tray can wash away the hair and debris on the surface, keeping the water clean at all times.

* The appearance of this automatic water dispenser is designed by an Italian designer, which conforms to modern aesthetics, making it not only a pet water dispenser, but also matches the design of your home.

  • Model: CW003
  • Capacity: 3.4L/115oz
  • Filters: 3 Pack
  • Filter Model: PAWF001
  • ! For indoor use only!
  • ! The filter should be changed every 2 to 3 Weeks
  • ! The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks

Read more

Anti-dry-burning pump, you don’t have to worry about burning out the pump even if there is water shortage. The pump has a life span of 2.5 to 4 years.

The three-speed adjustable water pump can be used with different water outlet modes. It is recommended to use the lowest gear with the spring mode, and the mid-range and high-end gears with the faucet mode.

Removable water pump, easy to clean, proper cleaning and maintenance of the pump will help prolong the service life of the pump, it is recommended to clean it once a month.

Read more

Safety Protection: 1.2m woven power cord, which is sturdy and tight, and not easy to be bitten or chewed by pets, don’t worry about pet safety.

Minimalist structure, easy to install and clean, it is recommended to clean the pet drinking fountain once a month.

Contains 3 replacement filters. The triple filtration system with water softening function ensures safer, cleaner, and fresher drinking water, making your pet healthier.

Read more


Cat Water Fountain
Pet Water Fountain
Pet Water Fountain
Model CW002 CW003 CW004
Capacity 1.8L/61oz 3.4L/115oz 2.4L/81oz
Flow Mode 2 3 3
Filter Model PAWF002 PAWF001 PAWF001
Replacement Filters B0B2P3Z5K2 B0B2JYRZCD B0B2JYRZCD

Q: Where can I get replacement filters?

A: Please search for B0B2JYRZCD for the replacement filters.

Q: The pet water fountain does not run with water, what should I do?

A: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

Q: Can l use this drinking fountain outside?

A: No. This fountain is designed for indoor use only.

Q: How frequently do l need to replace the filter?

A: According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, please replace the filter every 2 to 3 weeks.

Q: How often should l clean the fountain?

A: The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks. Please clean it once a week if you re living in an area with hard water.

Q: Does it have to be plugged in all the time or can it run on batteries?

A: This pet fountain has no batteries, so it needs to be always plugged in.

3.5

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

Product Description

100% Polyester Mesh
Enjoy Pain-Free Life with Ultimate Comfort – Our back support pillow is adjustable to the contours of your body, making it a great lumbar support pillow while driving or working long hours. The seat cushion for office chair is of utmost relief for coccyx/tailbone pain.
Best Orthopedic Pillow – FORTEM chair cushion has an ergonomic “U” Shaped Cutout. This sitting pad is highly recommended by orthopedic experts as it alleviates pressure on the sciatica nerve to reduce back, leg, and butt pain. Enjoy it as an office chair cushion or as a car pillow.
Premium Quality and Easy Maintenance – The seat cushion and lumbar support pillow for car are made from 100% pure memory foam. It helps maintain a healthy body posture by absorbing some of the pressure against your body. This half donut cushion seat and back cushion are encased in a removable, washable mesh covers.
Versatile and Lightweight – Our lumbar support pillow for chair has adjustable elastic straps, it can also be used as a lumbar support pillow for car seat. Desk chair cushion can also work as a car seat cushion, or wheelchair cushion. Being portable, these memory foam seat cushions are your all-time travel companion.
One-year warranty – Enjoy being driver of your favorite car, truck, or gaming on your computer to heart’s content. Your FORTEM chair pillow and seat cushion for car come with a full year warranty.

Price: $59.99 - $37.36
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:54 UTC – Details)


FH Group got you covered! Our premium cloth car seat covers not only provide the best protection for your car’s upholstery against any type of mess but they also enhance the looks of your car’s interior. No need to worry anymore about spills, stains, mud, or anything damaging your original car seats because this car seat protector got your back. Every car seat cover we make is built with high-quality, durable materials that will protect your car’s upholstery at all times. We offer automotive seat covers in numerous fabrics, colors, and designs, so you can easily find the seat cover for cars that fits your style the most. We have car seat covers for women, for men and for everyone. Our auto seat covers are compatible with most sedans, SUVs, and vans’ front seats thanks to the universal low back seat cover design that delivers the snug fit you’re looking for, only if the front seats’ headrest is removable. Also, because safety is one of our main goals, this front set of cover for car seats is airbag compatible (officially tested!). We understand messes happen, that’s why these waterproof seat covers for cars are convenient for any type of driver. FH Group car seat covers are a great car interior accessory for your vehicle. We have it all: car seat covers for SUV, car seat covers for autos, car seat covers for vans, you name it!
[UNIVERSAL FIT] Our semi-customized car seat cover fits most vehicles better than other universal covers in the market. Our design has hook-and-loop attachments for a snug fit, straps in the bottom seat, and more, for an almost-customized look
[HIGH-QUALITY AND DURABLE MATERIALS] Our premium cloth car seat covers full set is built with 3 layers of cloth, 3mm padding and mesh fabric, making our covers a reliable and durable car seat protector.
[WASHABLE CAR SEAT COVERS] These carseat covers are machine washable! Simply remove the car seat cover, machine wash, and air dry.
[AIRBAG COMPATIBLE] Our front seat car seat covers feature a special stitching on the side allowing airbag deployment. It’s officially tested, making our covers a reliable car seat protector.
[FRONT SEAT STORAGE POCKET] The front bucket seat covers feature a handy map pocket on the back of the seat so you can store everything you need and have easy access to it.
[CUSTOMIZABLE REAR COVER] This cover is compatible with any split bench and becomes 2 individual covers with the extra mesh piece. This cover features zippers providing full access to the middle armrest. Elongate cover by adding an extra piece.
[AVAILABLE IN DIFFERENT COLORS] FH Group’s car seats come in 10 different colors, so you can perfectly match your car’s style and aesthetic.

Premium Seat Covers, Auto Accessories and More!

At FH Group we offer a wide variety of automotive products designed to make your life easier and more enjoyable.

Read more

Travel Master Series Seat Covers

Package Includes:

2 Front low back bucket covers.

1 Rear backrest cover.

1 Rear bottom bench cover.

5 Separate headrest covers.

1 Bag of snaps.

Combo packs will include additional products.

Works with Split Bench

Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches

Travel Master Seat Covers

Available in several different colors. Fabric disperses heat to keep you cool and comfortable.

Premium Polyester Fabric

An eye-catching pattern adorns the center panel of this cover, adding a graceful touch to our high quality fabric.

Read more

Compatibility and Installation

Compatibility and Buying Tips

Due to installation requirement, please ensure your headrests can be detached before buying this set.This set is compatible with front side airbags and rear split function.

Dimensions

Semi-Universal to fit a wide range of cars, trucks, and SUVs.

Installation

Installation is simple with our easy instruction videos available on our website. This product is only compatible with vehicles that have detachable or adjustable headrests.

Product Features:

  • Airbag compatible – special stitching on the side allows airbag deployment. Officially tested!
  • Designed to fit 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, or 40/20/40 split rear benches
  • Semi-customized to fit most vehicles. Will not interfere with heated seats.

Read more



Unique Flat Cloth Seat Covers Complete Set For Most Sedans, SUVs, and Trucks
Highback Style Neoprene Full Set Airbag Safe
Raised Edge Multi-Use Cargo Tray For Home and Auto
FH Group Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover
Style: Flat Cloth Pattern. Neoprene Highback. Cargo Tray. Textured Grip Steering Wheel Cover.
Feature: Our high quality fabric with 3mm of breathable foam backing is soft to the touch and disperses heat, keeping you comfortable and cool on even the hottest summer days. These neoprene seat covers are waterproof, stain proof, and life proof to protect you from all kinds of disasters. Waterproof Neoprene with Non-Slip Backing. Rear seat cover designed to accommodate 50/50, 40/60, 60/40, and 40/20/40 split benches. Our premium all-weather cargo tray will deliver the ultimate protection for your trunk. Heavy duty rubber material protects your trunk against spills and messy cargo and a specially finished surface keeps your haul from shifting around. Is your steering wheel starting to fade and wear, direct sunlight and hot temperatures can damage car interiors. The FH Group Steering Wheel Cover is designed to protect your steering wheel, while adding a touch of class to your ride.
Package Included: 2 front low back bucket covers 1 rear backrest cover 1 rear bottom bench cover 4 separate headrest covers 1 bag of snaps. 2 bucket seat covers, 1 rear bench backrest cover, 1 rear bench bottom seat cover, 3 headrest covers. 1 Raised Edge Cargo Tray for Home and Auto. 1 Steering Wheel Cover.
Dimension: Semi-Universal. Semi-Universal. Available in 32″ and 40″ Sizes. Stretchable Silicone fits all vehicles from small sedans to Trucks and SUVs.
Cleaning Tips: Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth. Vaccuum or use soap and water. Air dry. Wipe Clean for best results use microfiber cloth.
Installation Tips: Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Helpful installation videos are available after purchase. Simply place wherever needed! No installation Required. Easily slides over steering wheel.

About Us

FH Group International, Inc. is a manufacturer you can depend on and trust. Our mission is to exceed your expectations by providing a large selection of outstanding car accessories at affordable prices. We are constantly striving to provide our customers with the most efficient and friendly communications, smooth transactions, and speedy deliveries.

At FH Group International, Inc., we offer a variety of car accessories such as high quality seat covers and car covers for most makes and models on the market, protective floor mats, genuine leather steering wheel covers, and much, much more.

FITS YOUR FEET PERFECTLY WITH WEDGE SHAPE – Measured as 17 x 10 x 7 inches, it is large enough to meet most people’s needs. Designed as a wedge shaped foot stool cushion.

MULTI-PURPOSE FOR ALL YOUR NEEDS – If you turn the foot stool over and put your feet on it, this can become a rocker to move your feet.You can also put the adjustable foot rest under your leg & back to help provide you with great support

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:32:31 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Xindell was established in 2016, focusing on the cleaning and maintenance of car windshields, and has professional and meticulous car care products and services, OEM car replacement parts.

Xindell Windshield Cleaner ensure that apart from online avenue, we have a strategic location, investing in state-of-the-art equipment and excellent friendly staff.

What Makes Our Products Unique?

a)Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield

b)Get to the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well

c)Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass

d)Fit with the glass surface very well

e)Multiple Uses

f)Anti-skid & Durable

How to Clean Inside Car Windows?

Spray your preferred brand of glass cleaner on the microfiber cleaning cloth and wipe down the inside of the windshield. This should remove what did not come off with just the microfiber cloth.

SHOP XINDELL STORE

Fast and Easy to Cleaning Auto Windshield: Most used to dread cleaning their car mainly because of that it was a big hassle to clean the windshield. Not anymore! Clean car window interiors and exteriors. No more hurting your back. The windshield cleaner is designed with the Extra Long extension handle and pivoting head getting to those hard-to-reach car window bases is simple. XINDELL windshield cleaning tool can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas effortlessly.
Helps get the hard-to-reach area of vehicle windshield pretty well! Car windshield cleaning kit designed with 180°swiveled triangular head to make a complete contact to the glass, which fit with the glass surface very well, easy to clean the bottom of car windows or some hard-to-reach areas, from interior to exterior, easy to use and effortless. Long ergonomic handle, easily extend to hard-to-reach window bases, leaving surfaces for even cleaning.
Multiple Uses: Works great as a fog & moisture removal tool. Easy windshield cleaner is safe to use on all surfaces and won’t scratch, ideal for interior & exterior cleaning, great for cars, such as trucks, SUVs and recreational vehicles of all sizes. The EASY windshield cleaning brush tool also are suitable for kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, mirrors, ceramic, shower stalls and other household needs! Also ideal for de-misting your windscreen in winter. No need to wait your vehicle warm up.
Anti-skid & Durable: The cleaning pad pole use aluminum alloy material, lightweight and won’t rust, more durable than plastic one, the end of the handle is with soft sponge, non-slip and comfortable to hold. 3 pcs Washable & Reusable Pads made of fine fiber fluffed material, can remove more dirt and dust, easy to clean, which helps keep it effective. The microfiber cloth helps to remove dirt, dust, and fingerprints on the glass. Great Design Car Window Cleaner!
Special Instructions: ●Interior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad or spray a small amount of water on the pad and wipe clean. Refrain from drenching the surface or smudges will appear. ●Exterior Windshield Cleaning: Can be used dry pad. ●Fog Removal: simply wipe glass with no added water or liquid chemical. ●Stubborn stains on the glass: Can be spray a little Glass Cleaning Fluid for wiping. ●No chemical or soap is needed to clean the surface, just a little water.

XINDELL UPGRADE WINDSHIELD CLEANING TOOL

The ultimate design goal of XINDELL windshield cleaner is to easily clean the car.

  • Is it hard for you to clean the whole of your car’s windscreen?
  • Does dirty windshield annoy you?
  • Is it always fog and moisture?
  • No longer worry about that as XINDELL windshield cleaner tool can be your good partner to clean your car windshield at ease.

Read more

The windshield cleaning tool can remove dust ,dirt and fingerprints on the glass, easy to clean the hard-to-reach areas.

-Ergonomic Design

–

  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.
  • The windshield cleaner with the long extendable handle and pivoting head easily reach into the driver and passenger side corner and other angles.

– Product Instructions

–

  • When you clean the windshield: you can use a dry pad to wipe the dust; You also can spray slight water or glass cleaning liquid on the pad to wipe the stubborn stains. Don’t wet the cloth completely.
  • Remove the mist from the internal windshield: you can directly use our window brush to wipe it.
  • No chemicals or soap are needed to clean the pads, just water.

-Replaceable windshield brush pads

–

  • Made of microfiber material can remove more dust and dirt, easy to clean, washable, and reusable.
  • The Windshield Cleaning Tool Kit includes:
  • 1 * Car Windshield Cleaner
  • 3 * Microfiber Bonnets
  • 1 * Empty Spray Bottle

Product Description

GAGURL reusable pet pads made of 4 Layers material with silicone non-slip bottom, has strong absorption to liquid, could well to against the heaviest smell. It could well protect your pets from slide or pad movement. Ideal for training, playpen, cat litter box, crate, ultimate protection for floor, carpet, bed, furniture, sofa, car seat. Our durable pet pad can be reused while saving money.We at GAGURL spend countless hours in developing, sourcing, and testing our products. Our primary concerns are that everything we make is safe for pets and their owners, a quality item, and has great value.

4- LAYER DESIGN

1 layer:100% polyester knitting surfac.

2 layer: Thickened super absorbent cotton.

3 layer: Breathable waterproof PUL inner layer; 100% polyester knitting fabric.

4 layer: Non-Slip silica gel bottom.

EFFICIENT ABSORPTION

The washable reusable pee pads are super absorption and non-leak, better to keep your pet and house clean. Ensure your indoor and outdoor furniture is protected against doggie wee accidents, floor water spills, and damage to your precious items.

LASTEST DESIGN

Our washable pee pads have cute patterns. Dogs and dog parents alike will love these designs.And 4 hole help you stick our pee pad on any flat surface so your dog never misses its mark.

COST-EFFICIENT: Our reusable pee pads for dogs ensure that fluids are absorbed and held for laundering without leaking. Washable and reusable puppy pads save you money and are good for our planet, our reusable puppy pee pads are good for 100+ washing cycles. Our pet pads are more cost-effective, of higher quality, and have a lower environmental impact than disposable pads that you constantly have to rebuy.
Durable & Comfortable: Our training pads are made of breathable waterproof PUL and a high-density inner layer which let the absorbency great and does not leak. 4 layers structure durable & comfortable, the first layer is a soft quilted fabric layer, the second layer is the absorbent layer, which can absorb 1000-1500ml of liquid, the third layer is the leak-proof layer, and the bottom layer is the anti-slip layer. Perfect for cars, sofas, beds, furniture, crates, and pet gate.
MULTI-USE: This reusable dog pad can be used for dog playpens, kennels, under food and water bowls, and cat litter boxes. It is helpful to protect our floors, sofas, and furniture away from damaged. Also can be used for car and RV travel, protecting car seats and car trunks. Our pads for dogs are perfect for pups of all ages. Use the pet pads to train puppies, and help senior or sick dogs use the bathroom in the right place.
What You Will Get: One package comes with 2 pack of reusable dog pee pads and 4 suction cup hook. 2 pack are really convenient for the busy pet owner, when the first get dirty, there is another one that can be changed, and that’s very convenient, your pets do not need to wait for the dirty one to wash and dry, and 2 pack keeps your house clean and your pet comfortable. We offer a 1-year guarantee, any problem, please feel free to contact us.
Reusable Puppy Pads: The washable pee pads for dogs are gray and have cute patterns on them, the reusable pee pads for dogs which is soft and comfortable could also provide funny for the puppy in travel. These waterproof reusable pee pads for dogs are a stylish choice! There are multi sizes to choose from, please choose a suitable size before placing an order. If you have any questions about the washable dog pee pads, please feel free to contact us.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:19 UTC – Details)

Product Description

MERMONY FOAM SEAT CUSHION & LUMBAR SUPPORT PILLOW

Back Pain? Are you sitting comfortably?

Most of us will experience neck, lower back or tailbone pain at some point in our lives; especially for those of us who are sitting for long periods of time before office chair/desk chair/gaming chair or driving car/truck for long time every day.

This will mostly depend on how much time we spend sitting and posture: how we sit.

Qutool Coccyx Seat Cushion & Lumbar Support Pillow combo is specially designed to help reduce pain and discomfort brought on by bad posture no matter if you are at the office, at home, in a car or on an airplane. Pain and discomfort is reduced through gentle support and by promoting a healthy posture.

Why seat cushion feel little soft/little firm?

Our office chair cushion is a perfect mix of firmness and comfort. It is comfortable as supportive. We all know that, premium memory form pillow is different from the usual seat cushion. They have a 7-10 Days adaptation. At first time, we may feel little soft or little firm. It is because we need 7 days to adapt the seat cushion. After 7 days, the seat cushion will fit us well. You will find it so comfortable.

Ergonomic Seat Cushion for Desk Chair

100% Premium Memory Foam

The bottom cushion sets utilize durable, high density memory foam to balance between too little and too much cushioning. Too little support can result in further pain, while too much can result in incorrect positioning and sitting in an awkward position.

Non-slip Rubber Bottom

Its texturized bottom stays securely in any seat. Perfect for your office or kitchen chairs, car, truck, wheelchair, computer desk chairs and couch

Easy to Care

The Qutool Seat Sushion & Lumbar Support Pillow combo is a low-maintenance commitment in terms of upkeep. The removable cover is easy to wash or replace.

Lumbar Support Back Pillow for Office Chair

Breathable Mesh Cover

Durable mesh fabric cover can minimize heat buildup and provide superior air circulation and breathability to keep you cool while easily standing up to tough everyday use.

Added Comfort and Stability

The two adjustable straps provide seating stability keeping the cushion in place and maximizing support and therapeutic effectiveness.

Corrective Sitting Posture

Seat cushion responds to the heat of your body to provide the optimal density of cushioning for truly support.

The back cushion provides a perfect blend of comfort and support for your upper, mid, or low back.

Suitable for All People

Material
Memory foam, mesh Memory Foam, velvet Memory Foam, velvet Gel Shredded Memory Foam 40% Bamboo + 60% Ployster 70% Bamboo + 30% Polyester

Help With
Relieve pains from Low Back, Lumbar, Tailbone, Prostate, Hip, Piriformis, Spine, Leg Pain, Backaches and Sores Relieve pains from Low Back, Lumbar, Tailbone, Prostate, Hip, Piriformis, Spine, Leg Pain, Backaches and Sores Relieve pains from Low Back, Lumbar, Tailbone, Prostate, Hip, Piriformis, Spine, Leg Pain, Backaches and Sores Adjust the height of the memory foam pillow to provide support for the neck, shoulders, back, and head back, and head Protect your mattress safeguard from dust, perspiration, urine, sweat and fluids Protect your mattress safeguard from dust, perspiration, urine, sweat and fluids

Scenarios
Office Chair, Gaming Chair, Desk Chair, Computer Chair, Recliner, Car Seat, Sofa, Wheelchair, Truck Office Chair, Gaming Chair, Desk Chair, Computer Chair, Recliner, Car Seat, Sofa, Wheelchair, Truck Office Chair, Gaming Chair, Desk Chair, Computer Chair, Recliner, Car Seat, Sofa, Wheelchair, Truck Perfect for back, side, and stomach sleeping position Great For Those With Kids, Pets, or Incontinence Great For Those With Kids, Pets, or Incontinence

【Premium Memory Foam Car Seat Cushion】Qutool seat cushion for office chair and lumbar support pillow are made of pure high-density premium durable memory foam which are NO ODOR and NEVER GO FLAT!!! The office chair cushion not only provide support hardness, but also give you with more soft comfort than donut pillow. Also can be used to improve bad posture and relieve leg pain while driving or sitting for long periods, enhancing your comfort while retaining its density.
【Coccyx Seat Cushion】Our tailbone pain relief cushion adopt U-shaped ergonomic designed by alleviating pressure on the coccyx/tailbone and relieving Sciatic Nerve Pain or Sciatica, Low Back, Lumbar, Tailbone, Prostate, Hip, Piriformis, Spine, Leg Pain, Backaches, Hemorrhoids, and post surgery or pregnancy pain relief. This sciatica pillow for sitting curved design minimizes pressure by cradling your bottom and providing evenly distributed support. Best back support pillow and tailbone cushion.
【Back Cushion】Lumbar support pillow for office chair alleviates pains from a greater surface area, including stiffness and tension in the upper, mid and lower-back region as result of back aches from sitting, muscle aches from lifting and exercise, arthritis, stenosis, herniated disks and general soreness. The contoured shape supports your back’s natural curve for proper spinal alignment and to promote proper posture. The back pillow also has UNIQUE POCKET FOR PHONE or other things.
【Works with Any Chair】Our Chair Pillow features a non-slip, rubber bottom to ensure it stay firmly positioned in a seat. Two Adjustable Straps keeps the back support cushion in place and the lumbar pillow won’t slip off. So the combo is suitable for office chair, computer chair, gaming chair, car seat, recliner, any home chair or a seat on bus, airplane or train. Our butt cushion is perfect for drivers, teachers, students, people with wheelchair, pregnant women, office workers, etc.
【3D Breathable Washable Mesh Cover】Keeps air flowing and comfortable all day, with removable cover which is easy for cleaning. Try it now, don’t worry. please let us know if our sitting cushion does not work for any reason. Order orthopedic seat cushion and back pillow today! Perfect gift for Christmas,New years, birthdays, valentine’s day, mother’s day, father’s day, weddings, graduations.
Qutool Seat Cushion & Lumbar Support Pillow comes with a replacement policy from us. Ask for a refund or replacement if you have any quality related issues (covers, zippers, straps, etc.) or other questions, please contact us via Amazon.
Tip:The Office chair cushion is: 18″ x 14″ x 3″ Lumbar Pillow: 13.7″ x 13″ x 4″. Our memory foam seat cushion is perfect for most common car seats, office chairs, gaming chairs，wheelchairs, etc. Please check the size of our products to ensure that they meet your needs.
